resources.string:
1. To Play the song use Play command. 
2. To pause the song use Pause command. 
3. To play the next song use Next command. 
4. To play the previous song use Previous command.

This is a music player that can also be conrolled using some voice commands. 
 
 This app is developed by Saif and Tazkia.
 Team Orion.
